messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Captain here.. lizards are not humans

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anything with a tail, is non human and is a threat to the station.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: FORGET MY LAST ANNOUCEMENT, non humans with tails dont have rights, but at least deserve to live

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The only right that non humans with tails get, is to live.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Liggers are nothing but punching bags.. but don't kill them. we need some sacrafices to send at threats to the station.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hang on crew, centcomm will be able to help us reduce the liggers will to live to zero.. later into the shift though.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All non humans with tails are to be perma briged, and sent to the labor camp one at a time. they are trash.. but can be used as a resorce

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So.. the voices in my head *cough* asked me not to make non humans with tails slaves.. but feel free to treat them like the trash they are.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also.. uh.. i dunno what i was gunna say

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So i hired a.. pest remover to remove the pests in maintence.. and to fix a few other problems on the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: May a clown come to the bridge, i need entertanment

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.
